title: Summoners Society
body:
Hey guys,

Its LSD here, you might have seen me floating around before. I am one the community managers for summoners society which is a league of legends facebook group of about 6.1k members.  

This year we are going to running heaps of awesome things for you guys from online events, (Premade 5v5s, Sign up as a solo/duo and community games) to our live events which be a pub crawl for us oldies, tournaments and so much much! We also run lots of cool creative events, like right now a paper cosplay competition! We also stand by the summoners code, so you always know we got your back. Summoner Society is a place for everyone to have fun and be safe! We hope you'll join us! 

Summoner society FB group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOCE/

Summoner Society FB page:https://www.facebook.com/summonerssociety/

Summoner Society discord: https://discord.gg/3zGt6Ya

Summoner Society twitter: @sumsococe

 See you on the rift, 

Loststardust

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Awesome group, really looking forward to all the exciting events! :D
{{champion:79}} Keen for that pub crawl! ILL BRING MY OWN CASKET
Such an amazing group of people and I'm so glad I found it {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
We are very glad we found you too! {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Actually so keen to see the paper cosplay competition personally. lol
I know right?! Its going be super amazing!
Got kicked for no reason, plus did not get rewards for winning tournament.
You do not get kicked for any reason (Y) Only get kicked for being toxic!
and how was I being toxic?
